task_summary: A robot arm pours liquid from a bottle or cup into a mug on a work table, involving perception, alignment, actuation, and retreat.

task_long_description.overview: The episode demonstrates a robot arm performing a pouring task. The robot first locates both the destination mug and the source vessel (cup/bottle) through visual perception. It approaches above the source, aligns with the mug, and performs a controlled pour by tilting the source vessel. After the pour, the robot retreats to a safe distance. The process emphasizes spatial precision to avoid spillage and efficient sequencing for repeatability.
preconditions: Both mug and source (bottle/cup) are present and accessible on the table
Robot arm is operational, bottle/cup is grasped
stepwise_plan: Approach and align mug position as target
Perform pour from source into mug
failure_and_recovery: If mug not detected: retry or reposition sensors
If alignment fails: repeat alignment or adjust approach
If pour fails: check source, retry pour
task_long_description.termination: Task ends once the pour is completed and the robot has retracted from the mug.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Locate source cup or bottle (held by gripper).
Move robot's end-effector above the bottle/cup at a safe pouring height.
Align source above mug with precise tolerance to ensure spout is over mug opening.
Tilt source by 45 degrees to pour into target mug. Amount is not specified visually.
Retract robot arm to avoid collision after pouring.

failure_modes: Mug or source not detected by camera
assumptions: Instruction is generic; frames show source vessel already grasped and held, so no explicit grasp step included.
Pour amount cannot be determined from framesâ€”in BT, amount is set to null.
Source object visually ambiguous between bottle and cup; best-matching name used.
No explicit OpenGripper or CloseGripper action since pour is performed while holding.

expected_success_criteria: Pour is directed into mug; no spill observed
